channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA CUDA Toolkit
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA CUDA Toolkit

item.title: CVE-2023-0196|2024-08-02T05:02:43.919Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20cuda%20toolkit
item.description: NVIDIA CUDA Toolkit SDK contains a bug in cuobjdump, where a local user running the tool against an ill-formed binary may cause a null- pointer dereference, which may result in a limited denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2023-0193|2024-08-02T05:02:44.145Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20cuda%20toolkit
item.description: NVIDIA CUDA Toolkit SDK contains a vulnerability in cuobjdump, where a local user running the tool against a malicious binary may cause an out-of-bounds read, which may result in a limited denial of service and limited information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2024-0072|2024-06-20T16:18:17.569Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20cuda%20toolkit
item.description: NVIDIA CUDA toolkit for all platforms contains a vulnerability in cuobjdump and nvdisasm where an attacker may cause a crash by tricking a user into reading a malformed ELF file. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to a partial denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2024-0076|2024-04-05T17:50:06.319Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20cuda%20toolkit
item.description: NVIDIA CUDA toolkit for all platforms contains a vulnerability in cuobjdump and nvdisasm where an attacker may cause a crash by tricking a user into reading a malformed ELF file. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to a partial denial of service.
